Name: Insertion sort
Other notes: O(n + d), in the worst case over sequences that have d inversions

Name: Selection sort
Other notes: Stable with O(n) extra space or when using linked lists

Name: Quicksort
Other notes: Quicksort is usually done in-place with O(logn) stack space

Name: Merge sort
Other notes: Highly parallelizable (up to O(logn) using the Three Hungarians' Algorithm)

Name: Patience sorting
Other notes: Finds all the longest increasing subsequences in O(nlog n)

Name: Counting sort
Other notes: If r is O(n), then average time complexity is O(n)

Name: LSD Radix Sort
Other notes: k/d recursion levels, 2d for count array
